definition: to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
to make sb change their ways, opinions etc
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

sentences.english: We hope nothing that is said here will go outside.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望这里谈的话别传出去。

sentences.english: The anecdotes of Wuling is a very funny movie.
sentences.chinese: 《武林别传》是一部爆笑的电影。

sentences.english: It must not get about that he is ill.
sentences.chinese: 他生病的消息别传出去了。

sentences.english: Don't let it get out that he's coming.

definition: unofficial biography (as opposed to official dynastic biography)
to tell others (a secret)/to divulge to an outsider/to be rumored
to spread falsehoods/to increasingly distort the truth/to pile errors on top of errors (idiom)
to leak (of information, liquid etc)/to divulge
to talk drivel/to make irresponsible remarks
scattered essays/various opinions/different manners of speaking
